official_title: Correlative Study of Epcoritamab in Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia and Richter Syndrome
inclusion_criteria:
* INCLUSION CRITERIA:

In order to be eligible to participate in this study, an individual must meet all of the following criteria:

* Must be undergoing screening for GCT3013-03
* Stated willingness to comply with all study procedures and availability for the duration of the study
* Ability of subject to understand and the willingness to sign a written informed consent document.

EXCLUSION CRITERIA:

None
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 100 Years
